title: Trying to reconnect?
body:
So I was in a que the accept or decline button popped up I hit accept but I got a message of reconnecting and this has happen multiple times now its happen to people on my list and such. Like it isn't my internet because this has happen to a crap ton of people and for some ya'll are punishing them and playing them in low priority ques but it isn't are fault that its happening its the servers. Like I refuse to play anymore games right now due to the fact I do not wanna be put on a timer for something that is not my fault. Even when I qued with one of my friends he even got Dc'ed from the lobby.  Please fix whatever is going on or tell me what I need to so to fix it. Please halp ._.
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: There were some service incidents yesterday that have since been resolved on the NA region. If you're still experiencing issues today, please let me know.

Yup. Issues across the board with this update for the client I suppose.

I have no internet issues. Client keeps crashing / trying to reconnect. Loses me LP and dodge timer.

LOVELY.
